description: Try our easy to follow Easy Lamingtons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Lamingtons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 bottles hard set chocolate ice cream topping

recipeInstructions.text: Trim sides from both sponge slabs then cut each into 9 even squares. Halve squares through the centre.
Spread bases with strawberry jam, top with cream and sandwich together. Place on baking tray.
Empty chocolate hard set topping into a bowl and stir until smooth.
Place desiccated coconut on a plate. Using 2 forks to hold the cake, dip into the chocolate to evenly coat. Allow excess to drip off. Roll in coconut.
Place on a wire rack. Repeat with remaining cake, chocolate and coconut.
